title: Autonomous Demining Vehicle
abstract: This patent describes a tracked robot for detecting and neutralizing landmines using ground-penetrating radar and a robotic arm.

title: Sensor Fusion for Mine Detection
abstract: Combines magnetometer and metal detector signals with machine learning to improve explosive ordnance detection.

title: Robotic Mobility Over Rough Terrain
abstract: Articulated suspension system improving mobility of unmanned ground vehicles across uneven surfaces.
